Marilyn Schreffler https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Marilyn_Schreffler 0 Marilyn Sue Schreffler (June 14, 1945 – January 7, 1988) was an American voice actress and actress who provided voice-overs for several animated television series, mostly for Hanna-Barbera Productions. Marilyn_Sue_Schreffler ( June_14_,_1945 – January_7_,_1988 ) was an_American_voice_actress and actress who provided voice-overs for several_animated_television_series , mostly for Hanna-Barbera_Productions .
